i18n.title: Rendering React Lists Introduction
i18n.description: Welcome to the React documentation! This lab will give you an introduction to rendering lists.

meta.title: Rendering React Lists
meta.description: Explore the fundamentals of rendering lists in React, including the use of JavaScript features like for loops and the array map() function.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, for loop, javascript lab, react, rendering lists, javascript tutor, map

i18n.title: React 列表渲染入门
i18n.description: 欢迎来到 React 文档！本实验将向你介绍列表渲染。

meta.title: React 列表渲染
meta.description: 探索 React 中列表渲染的基础知识，包括使用 for 循环和数组 map() 函数等 JavaScript 特性。
meta.keywords: JavaScript, JavaScript 练习, 在线 JavaScript 练习, for 循环, JavaScript 实验, React, 列表渲染, JavaScript 教程, map
